content: I'm looking for the current version of the FHIR ontology. The one on the downloads page is "not up to date". Is the current one already available somewhere? Thanks!
The one on downloads from build.fhir.org is as up-to-date as it gets. What are you missing?

Thanks, Lloyd. Actually I'm not missing anything. http://build.fhir.org/downloads.html just says "the formal definitions that define the predicates and classes used in the RDF format (not up to date)" so I just wanted to make sure to get the latest version.
That's the latest. @Grahame Grieve can possibly comment on the 'not up to date' wording...
I'm not sure that I can. I'm sure I wrote it, but I don't remember why I did that
@Andreas Keil Can you submit a change request for us to remove the 'not up to date' wording?
